name: ExperimentalReflectionOnLambdas
signature: @Target([AnnotationTarget.CLASS, AnnotationTarget.ANNOTATION_CLASS, AnnotationTarget.PROPERTY, AnnotationTarget.FIELD, AnnotationTarget.LOCAL_VARIABLE, AnnotationTarget.VALUE_PARAMETER, AnnotationTarget.CONSTRUCTOR, AnnotationTarget.FUNCTION, AnnotationTarget.PROPERTY_GETTER, AnnotationTarget.PROPERTY_SETTER, AnnotationTarget.TYPEALIAS]) annotation class ExperimentalReflectionOnLambdas

items.desc: This annotation marks the experimental kotlin-reflect API that allows to approximate a Kotlin lambda or a function expression instance to a KFunction instance. The behavior of this API may be changed or the API may be removed completely in any further release.
Returns a KClass instance corresponding to the annotation type of this annotation.
